entry.title: WIND WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 10:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 except 90 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 except 90 near the Strait of Georgia early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
